item.title: EP 895 - Herbert Mullin: Savior Or Serial Killer?
item.itunes:title: Herbert Mullin: Savior Or Serial Killer?
item.description:
Today we find out that paying attention might make you paranoid, and then we investigate the insane crimes of Herbert Mullin. Savior or serial killer!
